concept.title: Installing Additional Stage Libraries
concept.shortdesc: The includes a wide range of stages for pipeline development, but you might need additional functionality. You can install stage libraries to provide access to additional stages.

conbody.p:
stage librariesinstalling additionalinstallationadditional stage librarieslibrariesinstalling stage librariesAt this time, you can install the following stage libraries:
Stage Library Available Client Library Versions Description
Apache Kafka 0.8.1.x
0.8.2.x Use to access Kafka.
Provides a Kafka Consumer and Kafka Producer.
CDH 5.2.x
5.3.x
5.4.x Use to write to the Cloudera CDH distribution of Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Solr
Also provides a Hadoop FS origin for cluster mode pipelines.
CDH Cluster Kafka 1.2.x 5.4.x Use to read from the Cloudera distribution of the Apache Kafka 1.2.0.
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin for cluster mode pipelines.
CDH Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0) Use access the Cloudera distribution of Apache Kafka 1.2.0 (0.8.2.0).
Provides a Kafka Consumer origin and Kafka Producer destination.
Cassandra 2.x Use to write to Apache Cassandra 1.2, 2.0, and 2.1.
Provides a Cassandra destination.
Elasticsearch 1.4.x
1.5.x Use to write to Elasticsearch.
Provides an Elasticsearch destination.
HDP 2.2.x
2.3.x Use to write to the Hortonworks distribution of Apache Hadoop.
Provides the following destinations:
Flume
Hadoop FS
HBase
Jython 2.7.x Use to process scripts written in Jython.
Provides a Jython Evaluator processor.
Kinesis 1.x Use to access Amazon Kinesis.
Provides a Kinesis origin and destination.
MongoDB 3.x Use to read from Mongo DB.
Provides a MongoDB origin.
